name: dice bag of tricks
notes:
***dice bag of tricks crochet pattern***

this pattern is available for free on my blog, or purchase the ad-free, printer friendly pdf for a small fee.

free crochet pattern published on my blog:
coming saturday 2/17/24 to the blog.

✦ dice bag of tricks versatile crochet pattern

✦ fun, customizable way to store your dice.

✦ bonus! --> choose one of 3 modifications!
* worn bag of tricks with patches
* wild bag of tricks with vines and leaves
* wicked bag of tricks with webbing and thorns

✦ makes a great gift for the dnd gamer or rpg player in your life!

✦ simple drawstring closure is easy to open and close.

✦ learn to create surface/slip stitch crochet with photo tutorials.

✦ learn to create a magic circle with with photo and video tutorials.

--> this is an easy crochet pattern, appropriate for advanced beginners with simple stitches and detailed photo tutorials.

click here to join my vip facebook community for exclusive discounts, cals, giveaways and more! --> [**join the fb group!**][1]

**what is included:**
9 page pdf pattern in us english with american crochet terms. your pattern is available to download from your ravelry purchases, and an email will be sent with a download link as well.

**sizing:**
8” long (laid flat) x 4” diameter at round 6

**supplies needed:**
✦ worsted weight yarn
✦ yardage: 120 - 160 yards total
bag: 100-110 yds 
accents: 10-50 yds
✦ hooks: g/6 4.0 mm hook, c/2 2.75 mm (for thorns only)


**stitch key:**
sl st - slip stitch
sc - single crochet
hdc - half double crochet
hdc2tog - decrease by hdc 2 sts together 
dc - double crochet 
blo - back loop only
flo - front loop only


***green fox farms designs original crochet pattern!***

i am here to help if you have any questions! feel free to send me a message through my blog or social media (fb & ig links below)! this pattern has been thoroughly tested and tech edited.

this pattern is my intellectual property. you are welcome to make as many as you like, sell them, give them away, etc. you may not sell, or alter and claim as your own this pattern. this pattern may not be mass produced, it is for individual use only. you may not use my photographs.

if you want to share this pattern online, you must only share a link to my blog. you may not copy and paste my text / the pattern to another site. thank you for respecting my work. :)

thank you!
lisa fox
